forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

thread.title: Thunderday II: Rise of the Updates

comments.text: Hi everyone! Here's what's new in version 160.9 (you're on [version].) Hope you enjoy! ☛ pls heart this comment if you see this :) ❤❤❤
On the back of the Video dialog, there's a new "Open in Browser" button!
... Use it when e.g. the video isn't playing sound, or you want it to open in the browser for another reason.
The Highlight dialog (via the Area dialog's back) has been improved! It now has icons, grouping, button text styles, and help (i)'s.
We increased the max number of friends the Friends dialog can load from 100 to 250.
... If you've ever found yourself using that dialog's search function to find someone, but they didn't appear because you had too many friends, please try again now.
